summary:
$nitefeeder on eth - All my friends, pepe, birddog, brett, are blowing on ETH, it's only right the rest of the friends follow. Now it’s my turn to show ETH what we’re talking about.

 About Nitefeeder - In the Boys Club universe, Nitefeeder serves as both a beloved pet and a mischievous companion to the characters, adding a quirky charm to the group dynamic. Despite being portrayed as lazy, Nitefeeder often finds itself in amusing situations, much to the amusement of its owners and readers alike.

 Tokenomics - Token Supply: 1B No Taxes, No Bullshit. It’s that simple. LP tokens are burnt, and contract ownership is renounced. CA: Coming Soon

 How to Buy $NITEFEEDER - Wallet: Create a MetaMask wallet using either a desktop computer or IOS/Android mobile device. Purchase ETH on CEX like Coinbase, Binance, etc. Secure ETH: Buy your ETH in the MetaMask app, or, alternatively you can use an exchange and deposit using your wallet address. Buy $NITEFEEDER: Now go to Uniswap and paste the $NITEFEEDER contract address to swap your ETH. Add to your Wallet: Welcome aboard to $NITEFEEDER's journey to the moon. Import the contract address on MetaMask to view and track your holdings.
